verses.roman:
sei-jana nija-grāme kariyā gamana
'kṛṣṇa' bali' hāse, kānde, nāce anukṣaṇa

synonyms: sei-jana—that person; nija-grāme—to his own village; kariyā gamana—returning there; kṛṣṇa bali'-saying the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa; hāse—laughs; kānde—cries; nāce—dances; anukṣaṇa—always.
translation: Being thus empowered, they would return to their own villages, always chanting the holy name of Kṛṣṇa and sometimes laughing, crying and dancing.
